message.content:
cs.DB, cs.AI, cs.HC, cs.LG, cs.IR 

This paper proposes a formal framework for representing and understanding information needs in database querying and exploration. It uses a signaling game approach to model the collaboration between the user and the database management system. This approach involves strategies and convergence analysis, which are typical topics in machine learning and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and game theory (cs.GT). The paper also discusses the effectiveness of query interfaces, which is related to human-computer interaction (cs.HC). The framework aims to improve the effectiveness of answering queries, which is a core problem in database management (cs.DB) and information retrieval (cs.IR).
